channel.title: Go Azure Meetup
channel.description: Recent content on Go Azure Meetup

item.title: Get up and running with Kubernetes
Daniel Paulus
item.description: Daniel is a serial conference and meetup organiser. He’s Head of Azure Solutions at The Factory, a Cloud Native focused consultancy company, and a Microsoft Azure MVP. He helps companies succeed with Cloud Native technologies and DevOps practices. When not working with tech you can find him out in the woods or fishing at a lake.

item.title: Joost van Uitert
item.description: Out in Nieuwegein, The Netherlands, you’ll find Joost van Uitert, a software engineer who loves making cool and efficient solutions. He’s got a real hunger for learning, and keyboards have been his latest passion in this tech journey.
